item.title: [help]add new npc to your rsps[help]all link in
item.dc:creator: @mikscape mikscape
item.description:
@mikscape wrote:

hi everyone ,
i need to add an npc to my rsps
and i dont know how .
here the link :
my entitydef.java :
http://uppit.com/ddcgu8dol33t/EntityDef.rar
and here the npc model link :
http://uppit.com/5ffqvzccyfg5/63604.dat

the first :

if(i == ****) { entityDef.itemActions = new String[5]; entityDef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 63604; entityDef.anInt77 = 12790; entityDef.anInt86 = 15; entityDef.anInt67 = 12790; entityDef.anInt91 = 15; entityDef.aByte68 = 5; entityDef.name = "WildyWyrm"; entityDef.combatLevel = 382; entityDef.description = "It's made of pure fire.".getBytes(); }

the second :

case ****: entityDef.itemActions = new String[5]; entityDef.itemActions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 63604; entityDef.anInt77 = 12790; entityDef.anInt86 = 15; entityDef.anInt67 = 12790; entityDef.anInt91 = 15; entityDef.aByte68 = 5; entityDef.name = "WildyWyrm"; entityDef.combatLevel = 382; entityDef.description = "It's made of pure fire.".getBytes(); break;

i dont know wish code come with it .
only code my entitydef.java and put the link in the repost

Read full topic
